title: A couple’s car fell 300 feet. A new iPhone feature aided their rescue.
description: California couple Cloe Fields and Christian Zelada survived the fall with help from the iPhone 14’s Emergency SOS via satellite.

title: From Jared Kushner to Salt Bae: Here’s who Elon Musk was seen with at the World Cup
description: Photos taken of Musk during the World Cup show him amid a group that included Jared Kushner, Qatari leaders and an Indian steelmaking magnate.

title: Musk says he will find new Twitter CEO but keep control of key divisions
description: Elon Musk said he would find a new Twitter CEO after a poll mandated he step down.

title: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg snubs fitness as key to metaverse growth
description: Zuckerberg defended Meta’s reliance on acquisitions to build out virtual and augmented reality services, saying that under current economic conditions, Meta would be unlikely to take on developing a fitness app of its own.

title: How a group of ‘GTA V’ developers became unlikely motorsports champions
description: The passion project emerged after the technical director behind "GTA V's" car physics asked himself: “What if I tried racing these cars in real life?”

title: Sweeping spending bill would ban TikTok on government devices
description: The prohibition is the latest step by governments, mostly at the state level, to try to curb TikTok’s reach.

title: How families can get the most from YouTube for kids, or dump it
description: Opt for YouTube Kids. Check out these three great kids channels. And try more tips from experts on how your family can get the most from YouTube.

title: Faxes and floppy disks: Japan’s bureaucracy needs an upgrade
description: Digital Minister Taro Kono wants to take Japan’s government out of the analog age and into the digital.
